Posts.Content: Hi, I have been on Zoladex since Jan, 2010 and Femara then Arimidex since march 2010.  I have so much joint pain and GI upsets.  The Zolodex has the same effects for me as the Aromatease Inhibitors.  Lots of mood swings, some hot flashes and difficulty eating and sleeping.  Good luck to you.  I hear some people have few symptoms.
Posts.Title: Any one on Hormonal Therapy
